alert.note: Alert for Bland; Giles; Smyth; Tazewell; Wythe (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 07 at 4:53AM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Giles, northeastern Smyth, east central Tazewell, Bland, northwestern Wythe and south central Mercer Counties through 530 AM EDT... At 453 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ceres, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bland... Rural Retreat... Ceres... Rocky Gap... Bastian... Nebo... and Mechanicsburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
